name: touchcontroller
author: Pavol Hejn√Ω <me@pavolhejny.com> (https://pavolhejny.com)
description: Touch and mouse controller for web apps and games

scripts.autofix: npm run pretty-imports && npm run lint-fix
scripts.autofix-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run autofix && git add src && git commit --allow-empty -m "Autofixing"
scripts.documentation-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run documentation && git add docs && git commit --allow-empty -m "TouchController"
scripts.generate-main-exports-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run generate-main-exports && npm run autofix && git add src && git commit --allow-empty -m "Updating exports"
scripts.preversion: npm test  && npm run autofix-commit && npm run generate-main-exports-commit && npm run build && npm run documentation-commit
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.update: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm ./package-lock.json && npx ncu -u && npm install
